roleset.name: to pay attention to, consider

example.name: transitive
example.text: The opposition Labor Party leader , Neil Kinnock , in a display of the male chauvinism typical of the British lower class , denounced [Mrs. Thatcher]-2 for *-2 having an independent mind and refusing [*] to heed the men in her Cabinet .

roleset.note: HEED-V NOTES: No Vncls, No FN. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from heed.01-v)
